description:
As the Regional Security Program Manager, you will work with both internal and external partners to maintain and enhance the security and safety of Google. Reporting to the Global Operations Program Manager, you will manage an unconventional and discrete security operations program involving in-house and vendor operated specialist teams and other specialized programs on a regional scale. In addition, you will deputize the Global Operations Program Manager when needed.

The operational development of programs include tactical deployment and technology implementation, development of operational consistency among regional partners and organization maturity through aligned documentation, data collection and analysis as well as implementation of program specific quality assurance functions. You will collaborate closely with the Regional Security Operations teams participating in the security program as well as other internal and external stakeholders. These programs are key functions of an innovative layered security approach and play important roles in protecting, sustaining and enabling Google’s ability to thrive in ever changing operating environments.

From keeping Googlers safe and secure to managing disruptive events, the ability to anticipate, deter, detect, and act are the pillars of Google’s Global Security and Resilience Services (GSRS) team. As a member of GSRS you will help develop a culture where safety, security and resiliency are integrated into every facet of Google, including the creative process. You will help us continually identify, evaluate and monitor enterprise risks that could affect business activities and provide business leaders the information they need to make critical decisions. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to create innovative strategies and develop best in class programs that drive sustainable effectiveness.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of experience in corporate security, law enforcement or military operations.
  • Experience managing teams who build and execute security operational programs.
  • Ability to travel domestically and internationally up to 10% of the time.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in unconventional and discrete security, law enforcement, military operations and related security technologies and special applications.
  • International experience in corporate security and law enforcement operations.
  • Understanding of the challenges of operating in various different kinds of legal and cultural operating environments.
  • Proficiency in the use of common business software programs and familiarity with Google applications (G-suite).
  • Detail-oriented with strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to perform in a fast-paced environment.
responsibilities:
• Manage a large scale team and security program aligning documentation, data collection and analysis regionally.
  • Enhance operational efficiency improving tactical deployment and technology implementation.
  • Coordinate training efforts across in-house and vendor operated teams.
  • Collaborate with security and non-security stakeholders to support functions within Google and interest groups outside of Google.
  • Conduct regular benchmarking to support program development.
title: Regional Security Program Manager
